text.content: Camila lost her best friend Juanin a bike accident in front of their school.
A driver who was doing drugs hit him.
Camila blamed his carelessness for Juan's death.
At court, the judge said this was the result of irresponsible behavior.
Camila decided to promote road safety in honor of Juan.
The driver went to jail But Camila knew this wasn't enough.
Instead of grieving, she became productive visiting schools to teach safety.
She taught teens how to avoid dangerours situations.
Now camila works with the city to install traffic lights near schools.
Juan's memory lives on through her work.
